short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi-DSP organisation tool for Programmatic Trading

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
---
✓ Group campaign objects from DSPs including DBM, AAP, Brightroll into one 'campaign' object
✓ Keep campaign-specific notes and priority lists
✓ See data across all your devices 

Release Notes
---
Visit the GitHub repository for full release notes

- Repository: https://github.com/benkahandevelopment/neatdsp
- Releases: https://github.com/benkahandevelopment/neatdsp/releases
